author: Simon Difford
description: Dashes of bitters just keep this from wavering onto the sweet side of bittersweet. Honey adds delicate richness to rye whiskey and amaro.
name: Dante's Old Fashioned Whiskey Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
